services.description: Allows users to make calls to five selected Nepal Telecom numbers at a discounted price, even during business hours.

service_details.allowed_numbers: Nepal Telecom's PSTN, Postpaid, or Prepaid Mobile numbers

ussd_codes.to_subscribe: Type FNF<space>NT Number and send it to 1415
ussd_codes.to_add_member: Type FNF<space>NT Number and send it to 1415 (repeat for next numbers)
ussd_codes.to_modify_member: Type FNF<space>NT Number and send it to 1415
ussd_codes.to_delete_member: Type FNF<space>NT Number and send it to 1415
ussd_codes.to_inquire_members: Type FNF<space>NT Number and send it to 1415

benefits: International Dialling (ISD) service activated by default

important_numbers.1415: To recharge account, query balance, and check expiry dates
important_numbers.1498: Namaste Customer Care Service for Pre-Paid related complaints and information
important_numbers.011614: To divert calls to NEPAL TELECOM Mobile Voice Mail System (VMS)
important_numbers.011616: To check/retrieve messages and for Mailbox management

pin_puk.pin_lock: If wrong PIN entered 3 times, SIM locks and asks for PUK
pin_puk.puk_lock: If wrong PUK entered 10 times, SIM card permanently damaged
pin_puk.security_code_use: Required for Balance Transfer, SIM block, SIM Re-activate
pin_puk.note: Securely keep PIN/PUK and Security Code for future use

services.description: Corporate mobile service package for businesses
benefits: Unlimited On-Net Call for Some Packages
Mix of Prepaid and Postpaid numbers allowed

requirements: Request letter from the company along with member list and mobile numbers (minimum 10 members)
If members don't own Nepal Telecom numbers, the company can apply for mobile numbers during CUG registration

terminology_notes.nt_nt: Includes any Nepal Telecom number (GSM or PSTN)
terminology_notes.ot_applicability: OT (2%) is applicable in above tariff

contact.office: Nepal Telecom, Office of CCO, Bhadrakali, Kathmandu

services.description: Service that allows using NT SIM and number while traveling abroad

postpaid_customers: Visit nearest NT counter with government-authorized ID card

notes.postpaid_minimum_balance: Need minimum balance of 5000/- to activate. If balance drops below 3000/-, only data service available

tariff_information.data_roaming: Data Roaming Pack (for both Postpaid & Prepaid)

services.description: Mobile communications standard replacing 3G, allowing wireless Internet access at much higher speed
benefits: Much higher speed than previous technologies
Videos can be streamed without interruption and at higher definition

current_coverage.note: Plans to extend to remaining local bodies in near future

coverage.coverage_list: List of 4G coverage in all the provinces and its local bodies

requirements.sim_card: Older SIM cards may need replacement with newer 4G enabled SIM (Universal SIM i.e. U-SIM)
requirements.sim_check: Dial *444# to check if SIM card supports 4G/LTE

support.configuration: Subscription to 4G/LTE service and configuring it in your handset is easy
support.contact: In case of confusion, contact customer care center

recommendation.data_packages: As 4G/LTE enables browsing at much higher speeds, data consumption will increase. Advisable to buy appropriate data pack
slogans: Upload, Download, Share and stay connected – Be Ahead
Now at a much higher speed – Use NT 4G/LTE
First Time in Nepal – Cutting edge global technology at your fingertip
Try it now to feel the difference
It will be an experience you will remember
